#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,q;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n&1==1)
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
		else
		{
			//cout<<"even"<<endl;
			q=0;
		//	cout<<(n&1)<<endl;
			while((n&1)==0)
			{
		//		cout<<"while"<<endl;
				q++;
				n=n>>1;
			}
			cout<<q<<endl;
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
}
